Document:
# Carps
# Known variants # "Planetary space carp"
# "Magicarp"
# "Holocarp"
# "Rainbowcarp"
# "Sharkminnow"
# "Space Dragon"
# Missions objectives ## Elimination
Eliminate large and dangerous creature - [color=#a4885c]space dragon[/color] within given time constraints to earn a monetary reward.
## Destruction
Destroy a certain amount of [color=#a4885c]carp statues[/color] within given time constraints to earn a monetary reward.
